content: this pattern is for 11 12-inch fashion dolls not humans and will fit standard doll head adjust diameter for different hairstyles this pattern is worked in the round without slip stitches between row thank you for purchasing this pattern and supporting a small business post your finished project and tag #holdemhat if you have questions orcorrections email info@bzypeach com materials - 1 mini skein of size 3 dk tencel yarn or pima cotton 1 or 2 colors - 2mm metal crochet hook - tapestry needle - scissors
